content:
Hello @Grahame Grieve ,

I have committed updated sample files for the current FHIR schema. I noticed that the sample files that you moved to the FHIR Build\guides\ccda2 had the word "composition" added to the beginning of the name. e.g. composition-ccd-example.xml instead of the previously used naming convention e.g. ccd-example.xml.

I wanted to check with you whether it is necessary to add the "composition" prefix, and if so, I will update the files I just committed and re-commit them tomorrow.

Thank you
@Meenaxi Gosai afaik they do need that prefix - I'll fix them though as I'm working on that stuff now
the file name must match the id now
